title: Did Kejriwal Celebrate his Birthday Despite Vajpayee’s Demise?
subtitle: On 16 August, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal announced that owing to the critical health condition of former PM Atal Bihari Vajpayee and the flood situation in Kerala, he will not be celebrating his birthday.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Lal admits that Kejriwal did cut a cake but not in the evening like it is being claimed by people on social media.

According to him, party workers met Kejriwal at 8 am which was when he cut a cake with them. However, later in the day when a medical bulletin was released by AIIMS that mentioned Vajpayee’s worsening health condition, Kejriwal decided not to celebrate his birthday.
